name: Mango and Raspberry Wheat Bread!
description: A sweet and tangy bread recipe
recipeIngredient: 3  or more cups whole wheat flour
1  mango (I used honey manila mango 1/2 pureed and 1/2 chopped)

recipeInstructions.text: I made the starter this time and let it sit in the refrigerator for a day. For the starter, warm 1/2 cup water and add 1 teaspoon yeast and 1 teaspoon sugar to it and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: I made the starter this time and let it sit in the refrigerator for a day. For the starter, warm 1/2 cup water and add 1 teaspoon yeast and 1 teaspoon sugar to it and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Let it sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1 cup bread flour to it and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1 cup bread flour to it and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Keep this mixture in a covered container in the fridge for a day.
recipeInstructions.name: Keep this mixture in a covered container in the fridge for a day.

recipeInstructions.text: For the main dough, warm 1/2 cup water and add 1 teaspoon yeast to it and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: For the main dough, warm 1/2 cup water and add 1 teaspoon yeast to it and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Let it stand until frothy(10 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: Let it stand until frothy(10 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the milk, sugar, 1 cup wheat flour, salt and nutmeg and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the milk, sugar, 1 cup wheat flour, salt and nutmeg and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the mango puree(1/2 mango) and crushed mint. (You can add more mango puree if to add a more mango taste to the bread!!)
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the mango puree(1/2 mango) and crushed mint. (You can add more mango puree if to add a more mango taste to the bread!!)

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the starter dough which has been brought to room temperature.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the starter dough which has been brought to room temperature.

recipeInstructions.text: Add wheat flour 1 cup at a time and knead into a soft dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Add wheat flour 1 cup at a time and knead into a soft dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in a well oiled container, cover it with plastic wrap and place in a warm oven for an hour or until doubled.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in a well oiled container, cover it with plastic wrap and place in a warm oven for an hour or until doubled.

recipeInstructions.text: Take the dough out and knead on a well floured surface for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Take the dough out and knead on a well floured surface for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped mango and raspberries and knead well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped mango and raspberries and knead well.

recipeInstructions.text: Place this dough in a well oiled bread pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Place this dough in a well oiled bread pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Place pan in a warm oven for half an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Place pan in a warm oven for half an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 350 degrees F  / 180ºc for 30-35 minutes. Spray water twice every 5 minutes in the first 10 minutes of baking.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 350 degrees F  / 180ºc for 30-35 minutes. Spray water twice every 5 minutes in the first 10 minutes of baking.

recipeInstructions.text: Tap the bread to see if it makes a hollow sound to confirm that the bread is done.
recipeInstructions.name: Tap the bread to see if it makes a hollow sound to confirm that the bread is done.

keywords: fruit bread, homemade bread, vegan bread recipe
